settings.caption: Detachable reservoirs
settings.heading: Compact and Effective
settings.text: Despite its compact size, the Scrubo Flex features generous reservoirs. It boasts a 3.2-liter capacity clean solution tank and a 6.5-liter capacity recovery tank, both detachable for effortless maintenance.

settings.caption: folding design
settings.heading: Double Brush
settings.text: Introducing a dynamic cleaning solution equipped with dual counter-rotating 9" brushes that operate in unison. Driven by a 200W motor, this machine combines the adaptability of a mop with the robust power and efficiency of a scrubber.

settings.caption: Touchscreen display
settings.heading: Easy To Operate
settings.text: Introducing a cutting-edge design with a touchscreen panel that displays vital information at your fingertips. Keep track of the battery life with a convenient gauge, ensuring you're always aware of the remaining power. Adjust the brush motor with three distinct power levels for optimal cleaning. Effortlessly control the brush and vacuum functions with dedicated buttons, and easily manage the spraying of solution liquid with a simple toggle button. Experience ultimate convenience and control in one innovative panel.

settings.title: Scrubo Pristine Flex Owners Manual
settings.text: Please download the most recent owner's guide, including initial assembly instructions, safety precautions, machine operation guidelines, storage recommendations, maintenance procedures, and troubleshooting tips.

settings.title: Empowering Your Business: Support at Every Step
settings.text: Our goal is to optimize your business operations for peak efficiency. Should you encounter any challenges with our floor scrubbers, we're here to assist. Feel free to reach out to us via email or contact us directly at 1-800-350-4840.

settings.title: Parts and Consumables
settings.text: Whether you're in need of replacement parts or stocking up on consumables, you've come to the right place. Simply email us with a photo of the part you require, and we'll promptly assist you.
